snippet: To reach its goal, Fiat must enter a partnership with an Asian automaker that would give it access to the Chinese car market, the analyst Massimo Vecchio said.

byline.contributor: Bill Vlasic contributed reporting from Detroit.

lead_paragraph: To reach its goal, Fiat must enter a partnership with an Asian automaker that would give it access to the Chinese car market, the analyst Massimo Vecchio said.

headline.main: Fiat’s Challenge Is to Improve Performance in Italy and Asia
headline.print_headline: Fiat’s Challenge Is to Improve Performance in Italy and Asia
